body: The caster level of a magic shield or magic armor with a special ability is given in the item description. For an item with only an enhancement bonus, the caster level is three times the enhancement bonus. If an item has both an enhancement bonus and a special ability, the higher of the two caster level requirements must be met.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Magic Items/Armor/Caster Level for Armor and Shields
name: Caster Level for Armor and Shields
